s3games.robot

Class RobotLocation

  • java.lang.Object
    • s3games.robot.RobotLocation

  • public class RobotLocation
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a particular robot location - i.e. two sets of all servo angles. First set for the "above the location" position [0-4], second set for the "at the location" position [5-9].

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      double[] angles
      2x5 angles
      static int NUMBER_OF_ROBOT_ANGLES
      the arm has 5 degrees of freedom + the gripper

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RobotLocation()
      construct an empty location
      RobotLocation(java.lang.String locations)
      parse the location specification string as loaded from the game specification file

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RobotLocation getCopy()
      make a copy of this location
      java.lang.String toString()
      convert the first part of the location to string for visualization in robot controll window
